flags.text: This project guide will not appear in search results but can still be viewed by anyone!

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Making a metal rose is easy and fun. There is no prior knowledge required to attempt this project, and materials can be found around the house, especially a maker's house!
guide.introduction_rendered: Making a metal rose is easy and fun. There is no prior knowledge required to attempt this project, and materials can be found around the house, especially a maker's house!
guide.summary: Make a metal rose from a $1 Arizona ice tea or soda can and other houshold supplies.
guide.title: Metal Rose for $1
